title: Drawing, "Costume Design: "The Roar of the Grease, the Smell of the Crowd", Cyril Richard as Sir", 1965
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on gray illustration board
signed: Signed in gray ink, lower right: Freddy Wittop
inscribed: Inscribed in gray ink, upper right: Cyril Ritchard; verso, in black ink, upper left: The Roar of the Greasepaint and The Smell of the Crowd.
description: A man dressed in gentleman’s garb with top hat and cane, raising a glass. Behind him a coat hangs on the wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design: "The Roar of the Grease, the Smell of the Crowd", Cyril Richard as Sir", 1965.
1965. Brush and watercolor, graphite on gray illustration board. Gift of Freddy Wittop. 1971-1-5.
